text:
Partially my fault cause I ended classes late so I only reached the shop at 9.55pm, 5 min before closing.
But I went in there wanting to get 2 things, Panadol and neuflo because I was sick and just so happen to run out of those 2 medications that I needed. So I went in there and calmly asked for the 2 medications, the cashier rudely snapped at me that they were closed. There was technically still 5 minutes before closing so I was confused. I tried to explain that I really needed the medication but the cashier just kept on snapping at me that they were closed.
I understand that I came in very late, but your shop has not closed yet and the medication I needed do not require prescription. Overall was a very bad experience for me.
Changed new things after a few days which is good as I look for new things in guardian like the ice lemon tea and protein chips and bars

2.45pm Tuesday 30 April. Asked young lady staff whether she knew any antiseptic cream for sensitive skin and she replied "No idea". No further assistance from her. Quite surprised our sales staff are that bad.
Rude staff when informed her to remove the items not belonging to that particular row. Kept arguing back
Worst shop. Get cheated while buy online
